price: 44. „Ir kalbėkite su juo švelniai. Galbūt jis galės priimti patarimą arba (Allaho) baimę.“
arabic: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا لَّيِّنٗا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوۡ يَخۡشَىٰ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faqūlā lahu qawlan layyinan laʿallahu yatadhakkaru aw yakhshā
